str2: A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
An Israelite, one of the chosen people of Israel, a Jew. From Israel; an 'Israelite', i.e. Descendant of Israel.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From pros and echo; to hold the mind towards, i.e. Pay attention to, be cautious about, apply oneself to, adhere to.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
To do, perform, accomplish; be in any condition, i.e. I fare; I exact, require.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
